verses.verse: <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> - <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3040>Jedidah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5718>Adaiah<s%> of <S%H1218>Bozkath.<s%>

He <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H3212>walked<s%> in all the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H5493>didn't<s%> turn aside to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left.<s%>

It happened in the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H683>Azaliah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4918>Meshullam,<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> that he may <S%H8552>sum<s%> the <S%H3701>money<s%> which is <S%H935>brought<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> which the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H5592>threshold<s%> have <S%H622>gathered<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Let them <S%H5414>deliver<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6213>the<s%> <S%H4399>workmen<s%> who have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> and let them <S%H5414>give<s%> it to <S%H6213>the<s%> <S%H4399>workmen<s%> who are in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H919>breaches<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%>

to the <S%H2796>carpenters,<s%> and to the <S%H1129>builders,<s%> and to the <S%H1443>masons,<s%> and for <S%H7069>buying<s%> <S%H6086>timber<s%> and <S%H4274>cut<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> to <S%H2388>repair<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

However there was no accounting <S%H2803>made<s%> with them of the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into their <S%H3027>hand;<s%> for they <S%H6213>dealt<s%> <S%H530>faithfully.<s%>"

<S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> "I have <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>" <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and he read <S%H7121>it.<s%>

<S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H5413>emptied<s%> out the <S%H3701>money<s%> that was <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and have <S%H5414>delivered<s%> it into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6213>the<s%> <S%H4399>workmen<s%> who have the <S%H6485>oversight<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>"

<S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2518>"Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> a <S%H5612>book<s%> to <S%H8227>me.<s%>" Shaphan <S%H7121>read<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king had <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law,<s%> that he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H296>Ahikam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4320>Micaiah,<s%> and <S%H8227>Shaphan<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3212>"Go<s%> <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H5971>me,<s%> and for the people, and for all <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> concerning the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5612>book<s%> that is <S%H4672>found;<s%> for <S%H1419>great<s%> is the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that is <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against <S%H1>us,<s%> because our fathers have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H5612>book,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that which is written concerning <S%H3789>us.<s%>"

So <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H296>Ahikam,<s%> and <S%H5907>Achbor,<s%> and <S%H8227>Shaphan,<s%> and <S%H6222>Asaiah,<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H2468>Huldah<s%> the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8616>Tikvah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2745>Harhas,<s%> <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H899>wardrobe<s%> (now she <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> in the second <S%H4932>quarter<s%>); and they talked with <S%H1696>her.<s%>
She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Tell the <S%H376>man<s%> who sent you to <S%H7971>me,<s%>

"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'Behold, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> on this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and on its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> even all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5612>book<s%> which the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H7121>read.<s%>

Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H6999>me,<s%> and have burned incense to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> that they might provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with all the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> therefore my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> shall be <S%H3341>kindled<s%> against this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and it shall not be <S%H3518>quenched.<s%>'"

But to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> who <S%H7971>sent<s%> you to <S%H1875>inquire<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> thus you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1697><s%> 'Concerning the words which you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%>

because your <S%H3824>heart<s%> was <S%H7401>tender,<s%> and you <S%H3665>humbled<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> when you <S%H8085>heard<s%> what I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and against its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> that they should become a <S%H8047>desolation<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> and have <S%H7167>torn<s%> your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8085>me;<s%> I also have heard <S%H5002>you,<s%>' says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H622><s%> 'Therefore, behold, I will gather you to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and you shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H6913>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> neither shall your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> which I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on this <S%H4725>place.<s%>'"'" They <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> this <S%H1697>message<s%> to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
